name: devastation-orb-of-water-pota
prompt: heroic tabletop fantasy (D&D 5e adjacent), grounded medieval-fantasy materials, culturally coherent gear, no modern tech or signage, no firearms unless specified, consistent painterly collection style, Detailed artifact: devastation-orb-of-water-pota, pearl, coral, cloud-crystal, pressure-forged metals, abstract sigils (not letters), gentle glow, hand or ruler for size, product render, aquatic fantasy realism, subsurface caustics, bioluminescent accents, pressure-dome materials, palette: teals, deep blues, sea-greens, pearl highlights, Use specified aspect/resolution; avoid artifacts., Runes should be abstract sigils, not letter-like gibberish. Avoid readable words on the item., Avoid garbled or random letter strings; keep any symbols meaningful or use numbered pins., Avoid sci-fi UIs, modern signage, photoreal CGI, anime style, bloom glare.
alt_text: Artifact devastation-orb-of-water-pota with materials, runes, and scale.
revised_prompt: Paint an image that calls to mind a heroic tabletop fantasy, taking inspiration from 5e tabletop games, but in a painterly collection style. The main artifact is the Devastation Orb of Water - a complex object made from materials such as pearl, coral, cloud-crystal, and pressure-forged metals adorned with abstract, non-alphabetical sigils that emit a gentle glow. Showcase it in a rendered scene that suggests aquatic fantasy realism, complete with subsurface caustics and bioluminescent accents, reflecting the aesthetics of a submerged realm. The size scale is indicated by either an anonymous hand or a ruler. As for the color palette, lean into teals, deep blues, sea-greens with pearl highlights. Steer clear of modern tech, firearms, readable words on items, anime style, sci-fi UIs, modern signage, photoreal CGI, and bloom glare. Material visually should appear to sustain high pressure, like materials used to build underwater domes.
